# Projects {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

## **Data**

<br/>

- ### [**Data Migration**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/DATA_MIGRATION): Binary, CSV, JSON, SQL, and XML data migration scripts in Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, and VBA (MS Access and MS Excel).

<br/>

- ### [**Data Structures**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/DATA_STRUCTURES): Scripts overviewing data structures in Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, and VBA

<br/>

- ### [**Data Aggregation**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/DATA_AGGREGATION): Data aggregation (sum, mean, min, max) scripts in Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, SQL, XSLT, and VBA (MS Access/MS Excel)

<br/>

- ### [**Data Graph**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/DATA_GRAPH): Bar graph plotting with industry productivity data in Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, and VBA (MS Access and MS Excel)

<br/>

- ### [**Data Transpose**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/DATA_TRANSPOSE): Scripts to transpose data from long to wide formats in Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, SQL, XSLT, and VBA (MS Access and MS Excel).


## **Databases**

<br/>

- ### [**Connections**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/DATABASE_CONNECTIONS): Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, and VBA Scripts to connect to file level (SQLite, MS Access) and server level (MySQL, SQL Server) databases using various modules and ODBC drivers.

<br/>

- ### [**Environment Postgres Database Analysis**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/WORKSHOPS/tree/master/MEETUPS/PUG): Python and R Notebook analyzing environment data stored in PostgreSQL database.

<br/>

- ### [**Relational Database GUI Interface**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/MEEKNESS): Data retrieval and GUI interface using multiple RDBMS (Oracle, DB2, SQL Server, Postgres, MySQL, SQLite) and NoSQL (MongoDB) across various web and desktop libraries.


## **Analyses**

<br/>

- ### [**Climate Data Analyses**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/WORKSHOPS/tree/master/useR2020/awesome-climate-data): R Notebook demos of various government climate data portals.

<br/>

- ### [**Divvy Analysis**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/DIVVY_TRIPS_ANALYSIS): Tabular and graphical analysis of Chicago's Divvy Bike Sharing Program (2013-2016) by Stations using Python

<br/>

- ### [**Library Analysis**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/LIBRARY_ANALYSIS): Graphical and table data analysis of Chicago and SWAN Public Libraries using R

<br/>

- ### [**311 Service Request Analysis**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/311_SERVICE_REQUESTS): Data Analysis reports and maps of City of Chicago's 311 Service Requests, 2011 - 2016 written in SAS.

## **Coding**

<br/>

- ### [**GUI Program**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/GUI_Program): GUI report menu for data selection across multiple filters in Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, and VBA (MS Access/Excel)

<br/>

- ### [**GUI Table**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/GUI_Table): GUI menu to output tables across multiple filters in Java, PHP, Python, R, SAS, and VBA (MS Access/Excel).

<br/>

- ### [**File System Handle**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/FILE_SYSTEM_HANDLE): Scripts to copy, move, delete select or bulk files with command line arguments.

<br/>

- ### [**MS Access Toolkit**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/MSACCESS_TOOLKIT): Microsoft Access tool kit with VBA modules for everyday needs.

<br/>

- ### [**PDF Output**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/PDF_OUTPUT): Scripts for CSV data processing to PDF reports.

<br/>

- ### [**Random Data**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/RANDOM_DATA): Scripts to generate random data across various data types (int, character, numeric, boolean, date)

<br/>

- ### [**Text Parse**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/TEXT_PARSE): Text parsing scripts using Regex 

<br/>

- ### [**Web Scraping**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/WEB_SCRAPING): HTML table download scripts.

<br/>

- ### [**XSLT Transformation**](https://github.com/ParfaitG/XSLT_TRANSFORM): XSLT scripts to transform XML documents.
